role.argrole: thing arg1 is planned to be

example.parse: (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-PN-SBJ (NR 吉林省) (NR 长春市)) (VP (NP-TMP (NT 今年)) (VP (VV 规划) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-1))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (QP (OD 首) (CLP (M 批))) (ADJP (JJ 经济)) (ADJP (JJ 适用)) (NP (NN 房))) (NP (NN 工程)))

(IP-Q (NP-SBJ (NN 莲雾园)) (VP (VNV-WH (VV 能) (AD 不) (VV 能)) (VP (VRD (VV 规划) (VV 成)) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VV 让) (NP-OBJ (NN 亲子)) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 共)) (VP (VV 游)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 观光) (NN 农园))))))
example.arg: *OP* *T*-2 让 亲子 *PRO* 共 游 的 观光 农园
